entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Sparwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -15.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sparwood Airport 2:00 PM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -15.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -18.0°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries near noon. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm except 5 cm near Fernie. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow ending after midnight then cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm near Fernie. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Saturday 24 December 2022
